name: Handwoven Cotton Saree
description: A beautiful handwoven cotton saree, perfect for summer wear. Lightweight, comfortable, and stylish.

name: Bamboo Craft Basket
description: This eco-friendly bamboo basket is handcrafted by skilled artisans. Ideal for storage or as a decorative piece.

name: Handloom Silk Dupatta
description: A vibrant silk dupatta with traditional handloom weaving. Adds a touch of elegance to any outfit.

name: Woolen Handloom Shawl
description: Handwoven woolen shawl with intricate patterns. Soft, warm, and perfect for winter.

name: Handcrafted Jute Bag
description: A durable and stylish jute bag, handcrafted with care. Perfect for everyday use and environmentally friendly.

name: Handloom Cotton Kurta
description: A stylish and comfortable handloom cotton kurta for men. Perfect for casual and festive wear.

name: Handwoven Woolen Scarf
description: A soft woolen scarf, handwoven with care. Adds warmth and style to any winter outfit.

name: Khadi Cotton Shirt
description: A classic khadi cotton shirt for men, known for its comfort and eco-friendliness. Perfect for daily wear.

name: Handwoven Leather Sandals
description: Handcrafted leather sandals for men, made with premium materials. Ideal for both casual and traditional attire.
